install.name: IE6Alert! Module
install.author: Emmanuel Fontan
install.license: GNU General Public License v3.0 - http://www.gnu.org/licenses/
install.description: Show a alert message when the user open the site with Internet Explorer 6 and show links to download the most modern browsers.

param.name: message
param.label: Customised message (optional)
param.description: Message to show in the textbox (you can use html tags like br, strong,etc). If leave this on blank, then the module display a default message.

param.name: mini_msje
param.label: Mini-Message (optional)
param.description: Message to show in the textbox (you can use html tags like br, strong,etc). If leave this on blank, then the module display a default message.
